column1: 131kph, back of a length, he's back and angling this to gully
137kph, back of a length, on leg, he's back and squared up a touch
short and wider, 135kph, he cuts but it comes off the toe
flash and miss trying to thrash 130kph, short wide ball through point
shorter length, he's back and pushing this through point and they push for two and get it
good length, middle, he's giving room and cutting past point, they take on the man in the deep and get two
he skips down early, fired into the pads, it was straight but he was a long way down
darted down leg, he clips this neatly behind square for two
darted in, he skips down and works it fine to the man on the circle
starts well outside leg, it's fired outside leg, he drives to long off
drifting into leg, 97kph, he's back and tucking this to square leg
caught at mid off! Tossed up 101kph, on middle, he backed away to try and go over mid off, he miscues and it lobs to Burns on the circle!
wrong un, shorter, he's back and cutting this past backward point
leg break, down leg, Peirson misses it and they get an extra
full on middle, he reverse sweeps to short third man
short wrong un, he pulls but miscues, spooning short of the man at long on
very full outside off, he drives to cover but can't beat him
full on leg stump, he whips this firmly through midwicket, wide of the sweeper
beaten by a wrong un outside off
100kph, full outside off, he drives to cover-point on the ring
full outside off, he slices this up and over cover, Laughlin has a long chase and does well
low full toss, he steps outside off and sweeps to deep backward square
dropped by Cutting at long off! Tossed up, he carved it high towards long off but didn't hit it far, Cutting had a long run in off the rope, got there but couldn't hold on
smashed over wide long! Too short, he's back and cracking this over the rope
darted into off, he leans down to paddle sweep, gets a top edge but it falls safe
132kph, full on leg, he clips this in the air forward of square, lovely timing for a couple
swung away behind square! Length ball outside off, he was back and heaving this behind square. He didn't hit it well but it ran away at pace
130kph, short ball, he pulls in the air but it lands short of the man running in
caught at mid on! A brilliant slower ball, length, wasn't picked, he tried loft over mid on, he miscued it and lobbed it straight to cutting on the circle
slower ball, on leg, he's working this off the pads through midwicket and pushes for two and gets there
length ball outside off, he's back and defending into the off side for a tight one
87kph, full toss, he heaves this to long on along the ground
LBW! Some spin! Tossed up, on middle, he played for a wrong un, it was the leg break, pitched and spun down the line, hit him infront of middle and was crashing into leg by the looks.
full on off, he reaches out to defend
tossed up on off, he reaches out and drives to long on
short wrong un outside off, he's back and cutting late to third man
quicker wrong in, it hurries him, it comes off pad and runs to short fine
shorter length, 124kph, outside off, he's back and running this to third man
shorter length outside off, he's back and tucking this forward of square and they run well for two
slower ball, he is forward and pushing this to cover
131kph, good length on middle, he gets an inside edge onto pad
chopped on! Slower ball again! 111kph, length ball drifting across, he shuffled down the track and it just stopped in the surface, he tries to guide it away and only dragged it on
beaten by a 132kph, length ball outside off. Caught on the crease and just poked at it
short leg break, he's back and pulling powerfully to deep square
short wrong un way done leg! Peirson missed it. Five wides.
leg break sliding on, leg stump line, he's back and poking this to midwicket
tossed up outside off, he sweeps firmly forward of square
pushed through on middle, he's back and pushing this to midwicket
shorter wrong un, he's back and forcing this through cover-point
wrong un, good length, takes the pad but it was spinning down and would have missed leg
full outside off, he yorks himself and jams it back to the bowler
short and wide, cut behind point for two
full outside off, he drives firmly to cover
McDermott run out! Wade cooked him! Wade drives firmly straight to cover and runs, Burns has an easy job, collect and throw to Peirson and McDermott is out by miles!
wrong un, plays it off the pitch, cuts to point
dropped by Peirson! Brilliant wrong un, Rogers plays back and has no idea, it catches the inside edge but Peirson can't hang on
shorter outside off, he's back and cutting to deep point
beaten by a wrong un, trying to drive
short wrong un, he's back and cutting in the air to deep point
beaten by a wrong un, trying to run to third man
95kph, short ball, he's back and pulling powerfully to deep square
shorter leg break on leg, he's back and clipping this to deep square
full outside off, he drives powerfully to long off
full on leg, he tucks it behind square
pulled forward of square into the gap! Short wrong un, he picked it, was back and smashed it into the gap to beat the sweepers
tossed up on off, he leans forward and drops this into cover-point
shorter wrong un, he's back and punching this through cover
short leg break, wide of off, he didn't pick it and left it in the end
shorter wrong un, he's back and mistiming this to cover
sweeps off the top edge but it falls safe short of deep square
short leg break, he's back and pulling forward of square to the sweeper
should have been run out! Drives straight to Burns at cover again, Burns has a week to set himself and throw but he missed at the non-striker's. Wade gave up
short wrong un, he's back getting a thick edge past slip
beaten by a wrong un, he had no idea
slower ball, full outside off, he square drives to point
slower ball, full toss, he miscues back to the bowler
off spinning slower ball, he missed swinging hard
124kph, fuller length ball wide of off, he misses a drive
113kph, slower ball on leg, he's clipping this off the pads to fine leg
length ball, 130kph, outside off, he tries to heave to leg and misses
quicker leg break on leg, he's back and pushing this to long on
good length leg break, he's back and dropping this into the off side
full on leg, he's clipping this through midwicket
slog sweep over square leg! That was a big hit with the spin over the long boundary! 50 for Wade. He's played well.
wrong un outside off, he went to cut and then let it go
swept along the ground behind square! He flushed this from middle to pick the gap between the two men on the rope!
full into leg, he clips this to deep midwicket
shorter on the hip, he's back and tucking this behind square
back of a length on leg, he's standing up to punch it to midwicket
length ball outside off, he mistimes a drive, dragging to the circle at mid on, long way to run in for the fielder and they pinch two

Renshaw might have pulled off a ridiculous catch at long on with Banton in support! Wade went long and high over long on, Renshaw took the catch on the rope, he tossed it up as he stepped out, the ball was dropping over the rope, he jumped and batted it while he was in the air, and he knocked it to Banton who was there! Incredible thinking! But the third umpire says not out on broadcast but it hasn't been confirmed at the ground yet! There's a long delay. The third umpire wants another look. He does and he reverses the decision. Wade is out!
full on leg, he drives to long on
nearly a run out trying for two! Driven to long on, they run hard, the throw was awkward for Lalor to take
short and wide, he backs away and misses
full on off, he drives firmly to cover
caught at mid off! Slower ball, back of a length, he backed away trying to go over mid off and miscued to Cutting on the circle
full on middle, he defends to mid off, they take on the man and get a single
slower ball, on off, he's back and pushing this to cover
good length outside off, he's back and chopping to point
short ball, clubbed over midwicket! Powerful shot
full on off, he drives nicely straight to mid off

Caught and bowled! Super bowling and catching from Laughlin. Clever slower ball, he is deceived, he pops it back to the bowler, Laughlin was following through to his left, he had to stop and dive full length to his right and plucked it in the one hand
full outside off, he drives to mid on
slower ball, outside off, he's back and knocking this to point
full, speared into middle, he drives to long on
fuller outside off, he drives and gets a thick edge to third man
slower ball, he backs away and slaps this to long on
he swings hard and losses the bat and it flies to square leg
full outside off, he's across his stumps trying to paddle it fine but misses
caught at long on! Good catch by Cutting running in. Fuller on leg, he just lofts this with a chipped drive to long on but it carries too far and Cutting runs in to take a good sliding catch
slower ball, on leg, he's back and clipping this to midwicket
fuller on middle, he backs away and drives this to cover
127kph, yorker, he jams this back to the bowler
short and wide, he's back and thumping this through cover ! What a shot
forehand smash wide of long on! How well has he hit that! Beat the sweeper with a tennis shot
wide yorker, he backs outside leg
125kph, short slower ball, he's standing up and defending into the leg side
slower ball, he mistimes trying to slap this down the ground
good length, top of middle, he pushes this back to the bowler
dropped at deep midwicket! He swings it high to midwicket, Swepson has to run in a long way but can't hold on
short slower ball, he swings this to deep midwicket
full outside off, he slaps this to cover
137kph, good length on off, he defends to point
130kph, good length, fourth stump, hint of shape, he defends to point
good length, outswinger, he's back and pushing to point
good length, he's heaving this hard off the toe through midwicket
good length, wide of off, 134kph, he wafts and misses trying to cut
good length, top of off, he defends towards cover, there's some hesitation but they get there
Glorious straight drive! Full on leg, he checks a drive in the air but straight through the line, straight of mid on
shorter length, he pulls off the front foot in the air but just short of deep midwicket
edged to third man! Slower ball wide of off, slip was removed before the ball, he drives and edge fine to third man
back of a length, fourth stump line, he defends from the crease
slower ball outside off, it shapes a touch and beats the bat
shorter length, into the hip, he mistimes a pull to square leg
lofted in the air to long on but it's just short of the fielder
93kph, leg break outside off, he misses trying to cut
leg break outside leg, he sweeps fine to short fine leg
shorter, that stayed low, he's back and whipping this to midwicket
shorter length, he's back and pulling in the air towards long on but short of him
shorter length, he's back and tucking this to midwicket
shorter and slower, he tries to cut and mistimes off the bottom edge
launched over long on into the stands! Short length, he sat back and launched this with a pure strike into the crowd
tossed up outside off, he slog sweeps mistiming it to deep midwicket
Ellis nearly takes a screamer running back at mid off! Leading edge sliced high over mid off, he ran back and dived at full stretch but couldn't hang on

switch hit, he slaps this straight to point on the bounce. Hang on. They are checking if it was a bunt ball. It has been sent to the third umpire. Soft signal is not out. Did he hit it onto his foot? Surely not. No it has hit the pitch. It couldn't carry that far without bouncing off the pitch.
wide full toss, he slaps this straight to cover
quicker leg break on leg, he's jammed up defending
slid into leg, he's back and knocking this into the leg side
tossed up, he slog sweeps but miscues through midwicket for a couple
smashed over the sightscreen! There he is! Tossed up, he skips down and lofts this miles over the sightscreen. Lovely swing of the bat
caught at deep square! Slog sweep gone wrong! Slightly too full and he took on the long boundary, he mishit it straight to Ellis in the deep and he takes a good catch
drilled flat straight of mid off! Tossed up and he just swings through the line with an off drive that looked like it was shot out of a cannon! He hit that very very hard
nearly a run out! He glanced this to short fine, Bryant ran and Lynn screamed no, Bryant scrambled back to beat the Rose throw
slower ball, outside off, he stands up and knocks it to point
good length, top of middle, he defends off the inside edge onto pad, it rolls away for one
full into leg stump, he clips this behind square to the sweeper
fuller on off, he stays leg side and drives to mid off
shorter slower ball, he creates room and late cuts past point! Nice placement rather than brute force from Lynn
shorter on the hip, he's pulling this off the hip wide of fine leg
pulled powerfully over midwicket! Shorter length, he pounds this over midwicket
126kph, and hits him on the helmet! He was trying to pull but got through it a touch early and it rattled the cage. They run a leg bye
slower ball, wide of off, he guides this to wide third man

Superb catch from Rose running back from mid off! Short ball, he tried to loft down the ground and he sliced it high and straight, Rose ran back from mid off, Jewell was charging in from long on, Rose never took his eyes of it and slid to claim it with Jewell just avoiding him
shorter length outside off, he defends this to point
paddle reverse sweep first up! Great shot, reached out and paddled the full ball fine
conventional paddle sweep fine! Even better. Full again, he reached out and paddled it the other way. Superb skill.
good length on leg, he's back and tucking this through square leg
full and wide, he square drives to backward point
tossed up on middle, he checks a drive to the bowler
very full outside off, he drives firmly past cover and they get two to the sweeper
back of a length on off, he's back and defending to point
129kph, shorter length wide of off, he cuts but chops a bottom edge into the pitch
good length, he drives on the up to cover
caught behind! A little edge driving on the up! Looked like Shield dismissal. Good length, angled across, he drives conventionally on the up, gets a thin edge through to McDermott
back of a length, he's back and defending this to cover

caught at deep square! Bounced out! 128kph short ball but it was high and outside off, he hooks but not in control, he skied a top edge all the way to Ellis in the deep. They check for the no-ball. It's tight be he's OK. Just had a bit of the foot behind the line.
93kph, short and wide, he cuts straight to point
short and wide, he cuts behind point wide of the man in the deep
tossed up outside off, he drives to cover
pushed through on middle, he is back and defending
short and wide, he's back and cutting past backward point and he beat Ellis in the deep! Good footwork to create the room
short and wider, he cuts firmly to deep cover
back of a length on off, he's back and defending to cover
back of a length on off, he's back and defending to point
angled into leg, he clips this off the hip wide of fine leg for a couple
fuller, down leg, it comes off pad and rolls to midwicket. That stayed a touch low

Lynn is run out! Peirson cooked him! He defended this to cover-point and called yes and then no, Lynn ran and then turned back, Bailey swooped and bounced the throw from point, Wade zipped in from midwicket and took the ball superbly on the move to whip the bails off! Handy having a keeper at midwicket for that!
good length, top of off, he defends on the front foot
length ball on middle, he shuffles across to whip to fine leg
fuller, he drives on the up to deep cover-point
good length, top of off, he defends from the crease
119kph, bouncer over off, he shapes to play but misses
lofted down the ground! Length ball in the slot and he swings hard through the line straight to the sight screen and it just lands short of the rope
shorter length, he pulls off a bottom edge onto thigh, it pops up high on the leg side, Miller sprints from midwicket but cant get there
length ball on leg, he's back and tucking this behind square
an appeal for caught behind given not out. Good length, beat the bat outside off. He didn't hit it
131kph, bouncer, he pulls awkwardly behind square
over-pitched, he drives beautifully down the ground, Rose has a tough chase and he does well to save a run
good length, fourth stump, he's defending this to cover-point
full outside off, he drives to cover on the circle and takes one
drifting down leg, he glances this with superb timing past short fine! A poor ball and the timing was excellent to beat Ahmad at deep square
short and wide, he's back and cutting hard to deep point
pushed through straight, he defends from the crease
darted into middle, he stays leg side and cuts to point
shorter length, he's back and thumping a cut shot to the man in the deep
short and wide, he slaps this off the back foot to wide long off
slower ball, outside off, he defends to point
126kph, bouncer, over middle, he ducks and it's called wide for height!
back of a length, he's back and cramped in defence
slower ball outside off, he defends to point
he steps outside off, and clips this in the air wide of fine leg for two
short into the hip, he pulls this to deep square
slower ball outside off, he mistimes a drive back to the bowler
shorter length, he tries to pull but is hit on the body
pulled high over midwicket! Short ball, he backed away and heaved to the long boundary and he just cleared the rope! The man was rightly in off the rope because it is a huge boundary
hooked over fine leg as he falls over! Predicted the short ball, steps inside it and swivels to hook over the fence as he falls over
back of a length, he's back and tucking this behind square for a single
chest high short ball, he cracks a pull wide of mid on! The man was up, deep midwicket was square, he dropped short wide of off, and he slaps it wide of mid on
shorter length, he's back and tucking behind square
slower ball, on leg, he's back and tucking this to square leg
slower ball, he defends from the crease to point
slower ball, wide of off, he opens the blade and runs to short third man but can't beat
backs away and he's followed by a quick bouncer! Well bowled. He had sway out of the way
slower ball outside off, he steps outside off and clips this past midwicket
134kph, shorter length, he's back and pulling to deep square
slower ball, darted into middle, he defends
full on leg, he clips to forward square
dropped at mid off! Cutting smashed this to mid off and Miller dropped the head high chance! Cutting yelled at himself as soon as he hit it but he got away with it
slapped over cover! That hurts. Short and wide, he cracks this hard over cover for four
short again, he backs away and lifts this high over cover, Ellis has a long chase on the rope but hauls it in
tossed up on middle, he drives to long on
gloved down leg but McDermott can't hang on! Really tough one. He saved four really. Short bumper, he hooked, got a little glove and McDermott flew one handed to knock it down
smashed over midwicket into the crowd! He yells 'Come on!' He smoked that flat over the fence to win it
